credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Competition Design for La Fenice, Venice: Longitudinal section of the Salon
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli (1845-1926), Rome; Mr. and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and gray wash, watercolor, graphite on cream laid paper
description: Longitudinal cross-section of the theater in shades of pink (showing structural supports), gray and yellow (roof). Large main chamber has ceiling with rounded, coved corners and a central balcony above a doorway. Right third of section shows six rooms, the top one with an arched door.
name: Drawing
